Free API - Inspirational quotes JSON with code examples

The following API endpoint returns an array of inspirational quotes in JSON format Quotes Free API Youβ€™re welcome to use it for your side projects to the HTTP GET request and display the results. Usage examples: JavaScript: Fetch API ...
